name: As The Crow Flies
description:
An artgame about a crow and the power of words by Lindsey Bieda featuring poetry by Sylvia Plath, and hey, you can view the source on github. If you have issues or comments feel free to contact me on twitter.

Controls:

  • escape: Quits the game at anytime
  • space: Raise the crow up
  • p: pauses the game

Credits:

  • Game Design & Programming: Lindsey Bieda
  • Crow graphic: Jessie Molloson
  • Music: L'ultima pioggia by bzur (cc-by)
  • Poem: Admonition by Sylvia Plath
  • Testers: Todd Gizzi, wilkie, Jackie Kircher, Julie Pagano, @binarycleric
  • Special Thanks: @bechhun, skj3gg

Note: To run on linux this game requires a working version of love 0.9.0 or above (in fact anyone can run the linux version of the game if they have love installed)
